rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {0004, 3426, 3447, 3864, 3870, 3964, 3965}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {SWK3240, SWK3400}

unitName: Critical social work 2: Community work, context and practice
description: This unit explores the concept of 'community' and its applications in Australian society; the theory and practice of  the various community work models (social planning, community development and social action); the role of community work in social work activities; and the skills involved in the practice of community work.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
